sentences: Õnnestus meil projekt lõpetada õigel ajal.
Ta üritas korrata edu ja seekord õnnestus tal ka!
Kõik valmistas ette ja nüüd õnnestub see hästi.
context: The word 'õnnestus' is the past tense (perfect) form of the Estonian verb 'õnnestuma', which means to succeed or manage to do something. It indicates that an action was successfully completed, often implying that there might have been difficulties but they were overcome. The word is commonly used when talking about achieving goals, completing tasks successfully, or managing to accomplish something despite challenges.
